reviews.text: We were travelling back from DEN HAAG to brussels for our trip back to india and were in looking out for a hotel to halt for the night and there we found NH Burssels airport Hotel offering a nice deal for travellers just like us at a very economical rate.
reviews.title: Nice and comfortable

reviews.text: We were assited by the NH atlantic Staff in DEG HAAG to get a booking there and in a few moments it was all done and we were happy as this was our first visit.
reviews.title: Very dirty!

reviews.text: The hotel was nice and comfortable and just across was DIEGEM station which was connecting to BRUSSELS MIDI , the heart of Brussels.
reviews.title: Disgusting!!

reviews.text: Had a nice trip thanks the NH !
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel twice in the last couple of months. The first stay was Ok, breakfast is good and service good. Room was very hot, you can t open the window unfortunately. It was not cleaned properly and we found some toe nails on the floor the following morning........this is absolutely awful. The 2d stay was even worse, bathroom had not been cleaed at all...somebody blew their nose an dsnott was on the shower curtain...room smelled awful...we are not going back and would not advise this place at alll to anybody. Only good point is the location!!
reviews.title: The best place for business trip... or CCIE exam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Out of town hotel but good for a quick break. The rooms were good and clean. The continental breakfast was adequate. The staff were helpful and polite. The lifts were readily available and fast. we went for a concert at Forest National. It was a coach trip so there were quite a few guests. They struggled to make enough coffee but the staff worked hard. I would recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Very good for a quick break, although out of the city.

reviews.text: Excellent location for any of the companies on Pegasus Park.
reviews.title: Business Stay

reviews.text: Rooms are clean and a good size with excellent bathrooms and that all important pillow choice. Mattress was horribly soft but that's my only gripe.
reviews.title: Very Noisy Room

reviews.text: Restaurant is ok but limited. Fortunately the rail station is literally over road with trains to Brussels twice an hour. In twenty minutes you are down town Brussels with a choice of excellent eateries and all the choc you can eat.
reviews.title: My second home

reviews.text: Staff are simply brilliant. English speaking and very attentive.
reviews.title: Best hotel so far for business in Brussels

reviews.text: Scant shuttle service from airport, but located in a quiet business area with the railway station just across (presumably to Brussels). Functional bedrooms, rather spartan, very basic amenities, no free WiFi, slightly worn out look, but decent housekeeping. All in all your run of the mill airport hotel. Good choice of food at breakfast, with freshly squeezed orange juice available too.
reviews.title: Just the usual airport hotel

reviews.text: You don't stay at an airport hotel to lounge about and this is all you can expect out of this place.
reviews.title: Sensible Stay

reviews.text: Stayed at the NH Airport for 4 nights while in Brussels for a business meeting. 10 Euro cab ride from airport (they do offer a shuttle, but I did not utilize). Best feature of this hotel is the train station location which is literally across the street. So, if you find yourself in this area for business (it's adjacent to a large office park), you are still only 15 minutes from Central Brussels. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast was acceptable with a very large selection. The restaurant has a very limited selection however. It was also very quiet since it is so close to both the airport and the train station - from inside the room I heard neither.
reviews.title: Very Pleasant Business Trip

reviews.text: Stay at the hotel was very pleasant, Staff extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms very clean and comfortable, only downfall was the bed was very hard and the Tv alarm did not work. It was nice to have different hardness of pillows. Room Service Menu was very limited. Restaurant menu was quite limited but food was extremely good and staff were very attentive. Breakfast was very nice but limited in hot choices for the cost of the breakfast.
reviews.title: No shuttle to the airport - Very inconvenient

reviews.text: The hotel is ok. Supposed to be mid to upscale and it largely is however the fact that it is approximately 4 miles from the airport and most of the day they do not run a shuttle, makes it very inconvenient.
reviews.title: Eat dinner somewhere else

reviews.text: Not a 4 star hotel in my opinion, and on the whole not up to the minimum standard expected from an NH Hotel. Long wait for both check in and check out, rather tacky rooms, with no real bathroom seperated from the bedroom, not enough toiletries that you generally get in an NH, and not very friendly service in the bar and restaurant. I would not stay here again.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: I stayed only one night at this hotel with my colleague. The hotel itself is really qualified and good. To summarize the key points, I can say that;
reviews.title: Only Good for Business

reviews.text: + Positive : Our room was very large, comfortable and clean. The bathroom was very modern. You have an option to take away your coffee after the breakfast.
reviews.title: Comfortable, clean, beautiful, excellent

reviews.text: - Negative : It's not located near the city center. Getting there takes you 15 minutes by train. Breakfast was poor. I don't know the reason, but it might be a deal like that with the tour company I travelled with. The internet is only available at the lobby. If you want to use it in your room, there will be extra charge which is so absurd.
reviews.title: Great choice near the airport

reviews.text: This hotel would be more convenient for business stay.
